channel.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm Alex, I run a bootstrapped company at [http://www.jitbit.com][1]
Can't beleive I just discovered this place. Great job Ian & Andrew!
[1]: http://www.jitbit.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
item.dc:creator: jitbit
item.description:
Yep, we did, but the sales were pretty low so we have shut it down

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
item.dc:creator: Oliver
item.description:
Hey Alex @jitbit nice to see you here. I had checked out your site a while ago. Didn’t you have a standalone Knowledge Base solution available at some point?

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Yeah, we swap some notes. Have to stay ahead of the evil Zendesk empire

item.source: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
item.dc:creator: jitbit
item.description:
Thanks!

Yeah, we’re actually friends with Ian, people keep making fun of us at conferences. Like, “what? you’re having a beer with your competitor, wtf?!”

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
item.dc:creator: anon3850446
item.description:
Welcome Alex! Yeah, can’t believe this place exists either!

Andrew? Who is Andrew? Ah, Andrey – yeah, he’s one of the gurus around here!

JitBit looks like a great company! Are you competing in Ian’s space? Great job!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Alex. I run Jitbit.com
